resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Soak wheat in cold water for at least 1/2 hour. Squeeze out water in hands. Finely chop onion, parsley, mint and otmato. Add wheat, lemon juice, oil, salt and pepper and mix well.
resource.chars: Soak wheat in cold water for at least 1/2 hour. Squeeze out water in hands. Finely chop onion, parsley, mint and otmato. Add wheat, lemon juice, oil, salt and pepper and mix well.
